title: ISic000493. I.Sicily inscription 000493
body:
Facsimile Images

[⁦ - - - - - - - - - - ⁩]
1[···]RISVITALIS
2APPIUSETNICOLAUS
3AMICOOPTIMO
4LDDD

Apparatus criticus

  • Text of CIL

English translation

[...]ris Vitalis. Appius and Nicolaus (made this) for their excellent friend. Site granted by decree of the decurions.

Italian translation

[...]ris Vitalis. Appius e Nicolaus (posero questo) per l'ottimo amico. Luogo concesso da un decreto dei decurioni.

commentary

bibliography
